subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Item by item, Roger Clemens’s defense, his alibis, his excuses are crumbling, and soon he will be left with only his bare, unbelievable denials. He will be Pete Rose redux.
snippet: Item by item, Roger Clemens’s defense, his alibis, his excuses are crumbling, and soon he will be left with only his bare, unbelievable denials. He will be Pete Rose redux.
